title: Sidewall, 1850–70
provenance: No. 4 from the Prebble House, Richmond, Maine.
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Green floral motifs, alternating large and small, printed between rows of vertical gray stripes. Printed on off-white satin ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1850–70.
1850–70. Block-printed on machine-made paper. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-161-a,b.
